Articles.Content:
So I have this problem where my custom-made star is shining too bright on my spaceship for my view.

Is there a way to change the color/opacity a star gives on your spaceships? Like the ambient color that reflects on your spaceship when you create an atmosphere? 

The light of the star is not just TOO bright on my spaceship, but also on the planets orbiting around my custom star. 

My star file:

http://pastebin.com/2bWZTkxC
Looks like this is mod development rather than stock game development? And so, moved to Add-on Development.
